trans-unit.source: [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) should be used serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 应对 [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) 使用序列化和反序列化。

trans-unit.source: Provides serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.
trans-unit.target: 为启用 AJAX 的应用程序提供序列化和反序列化功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class is used internally by the asynchronous communication layer to serialize and deserialize the data that is passed between the browser and the Web server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类由内部异步通信层进行序列化和反序列化浏览器和 Web 服务器之间传递数据。

trans-unit.source: You cannot access that instance of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 无法访问该实例的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: However, this class exposes a public API.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此类公开公共 API。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can use the class when you want to work with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可以使用类，当你想要在托管代码中的工作与 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON)。

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object, use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要序列化对象，使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To deserialize a JSON string, use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要反序列化的 JSON 字符串，使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A>或<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To serialize and deserialize types that are not natively supported by <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>, implement custom converters by using the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> class.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化和反序列化不受本机支持的类型<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>，通过实现自定义转换器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>类。

trans-unit.source: Then register the converters by using the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过使用注册转换器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Mapping Between Managed Types and JSON
trans-unit.target: 托管的类型与 JSON 之间的映射

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between managed types and JSON for the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示序列化过程托管的类型与 JSON 之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: These managed types are natively supported by <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 这些托管的类型了本身受<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>。

trans-unit.source: When you are deserializing from a JSON string to a managed type, the same mapping applies.
trans-unit.target: 在你正在反序列化从 JSON 字符串到托管类型，将应用相同的映射。

trans-unit.source: However, deserialization can be asymmetric; not all serializable managed types can be deserialized from JSON.
trans-unit.target: 但是，非对称; 可以是反序列化并非所有可序列化的托管的类型可以将反序列化为 JSON。

trans-unit.source: A multidimensional array is serialized as a one-dimensional array, and you should use it as a flat array.
trans-unit.target: 多维数组序列化为一个一维数组，并且你应将其用作平面数组。

trans-unit.source: Managed type
trans-unit.target: 托管的类型

trans-unit.source: JSON equivalent
trans-unit.target: JSON 等效项

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> (UTF-8 encoding only).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String> (Utf-8 编码仅)。

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Single null char (such as, \0 )
trans-unit.target: 单个 null 字符 （例如，\0)

trans-unit.source: Null
trans-unit.target: null

trans-unit.source: Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Represented in JSON as `true` or `false`
trans-unit.target: 在 JSON 中以表示`true`或 `false`

trans-unit.source: `null` (`null` object references and <xref:System.Nullable> value types).
trans-unit.target: `null` (`null`对象引用和<xref:System.Nullable>值类型)。

trans-unit.source: A string value of null
trans-unit.target: 字符串值为 null

trans-unit.source: A string value of null
trans-unit.target: 字符串值为 null

trans-unit.source: Primitive numeric (or numeric-compatible) types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Single>.
trans-unit.target: 基元的数字 （或数字兼容） 类型： <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.UInt64>， <xref:System.Double>，和<xref:System.Single>。

trans-unit.source: The culture-invariant string representation is used.
trans-unit.target: 将使用的区域性不变的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Number
trans-unit.target: 数字

trans-unit.source: Date object, represented in JSON as "\\/Date(number of ticks)\\/".
trans-unit.target: Date 对象，表示在 JSON 中以"\\/Date （计时周期数）\\/"。

trans-unit.source: The number of ticks is a positive or negative long value that indicates the number of ticks (milliseconds) that have elapsed since midnight 01 January, 1970 UTC.
trans-unit.target: 计时周期数是正整数或负的长值，该值指示 01 年 1 月，UTC 1970 午夜以来所经历的计时周期 （毫秒） 数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum supported date value is <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) and the minimum supported date value is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM).
trans-unit.target: 支持的最大日期值为<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>(12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM)，最小支持的日期值为<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>(1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM)。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations of integer type
trans-unit.target: 整数类型的枚举

trans-unit.source: Integer equivalent of the enumeration value
trans-unit.target: 等效的枚举值的整数

trans-unit.source: Types that implement <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> that are not also implementations of <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 类型实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，也不是实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This includes types such as <xref:System.Array>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括类型如<xref:System.Array>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>。

trans-unit.source: Array that uses JSON array syntax
trans-unit.target: 使用 JSON 数组语法的数组

trans-unit.source: Types that implement <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 类型实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This includes types such as <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> and <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括类型如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>和<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>。

trans-unit.source: JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax
trans-unit.target: 使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象

trans-unit.source: Custom concrete (non-abstract) types that have public instance properties that have get accessors or public instance fields.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的具体 （非抽象） 类型具有公共实例属性具有 get 访问器或公共实例字段。

trans-unit.source: Note that public write-only properties, public property or public field attributes marked with <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute>, and public indexed properties in these types are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 请注意与标记为公共的只写属性、 公共属性或公共字段特性<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute>，且在这些类型的公共索引的属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax.
trans-unit.target: 使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象。

trans-unit.source: A special metadata property named "__type" is included to ensure correct deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 名为"__type"的特别的元数据属性是包含在内，以确保正确反序列化。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that public instance properties have get and set accessors to ensure correct deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 请确保公共实例属性具有 get 和 set 访问器，以确保正确反序列化。

trans-unit.source: String representation of a GUID
trans-unit.target: GUID 字符串表示形式

trans-unit.source: String representation of the return value of <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A>
trans-unit.target: 返回值的字符串表示形式 <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例提供了进行序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。

trans-unit.source: It requires a class names Person which is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 它需要类名称如下所示的人员。

trans-unit.source: The next example shows a more complicated and complete project that uses the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class to save and restore the state of an object by using JSON serialization.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用的更复杂、 完成项目<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类来保存和还原使用 JSON 序列化的对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: This code uses a custom converter that is provided for the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码使用为提供的自定义转换器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> class that has no type resolver.
trans-unit.target: 初始化不具有类型解析程序的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class without a type resolver does not include type metadata properties (named "__type") in the serialized JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类没有类型解析程序不包含序列化的 JSON 字符串中的类型元数据属性 （名为"__type"）。

trans-unit.source: A type metadata property is used by the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A> methods to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted.
trans-unit.target: 类型元数据属性由<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A>方法，以确定相应的托管类型转换为 JSON 字符串转换。

trans-unit.source: For information about type resolvers, see the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关类型解析程序的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver>类。

trans-unit.source: The custom type-resolver object.
trans-unit.target: 自定义类型解析程序对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> class that has a custom type resolver.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有自定义类型解析程序的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When it is serializing an object, the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class uses the `resolver` parameter to determine the appropriate value to include in the serialized JSON string for the type metadata property ("__type").
trans-unit.target: 它序列化对象时<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类使用`resolver`参数来确定要包括的类型元数据属性 ("__type") 的序列化 JSON 字符串中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class is deserializing a JSON string, it resolves the type metadata property value to the appropriate managed type by using the resolver instance.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类反序列化的 JSON 字符串，它解析为相应的托管类型通过使用的解析程序实例的类型元数据属性值。

trans-unit.source: You can set the `resolver` parameter to `null`, which is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置`resolver`参数`null`，这是等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> that is used by the asynchronous communication layer for invoking Web services from client script uses a special type resolver.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>调用从客户端脚本的 Web 服务使用的特殊类型冲突解决程序所使用的异步通信层。

trans-unit.source: This type resolver restricts the types that can be deserialized to those defined in the Web service’s method signature, or the ones that have the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.GenerateScriptTypeAttribute> applied.
trans-unit.target: 此类型解析程序将可以反序列化的类型限制为在 Web 服务的方法签名或具有那些中定义<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.GenerateScriptTypeAttribute>应用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify this built-in type resolver programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 不能以编程方式修改此内置类型解析程序。

trans-unit.source: Using an instance of this object initialized with a custom type-resolver can present a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义的类型解析器使用初始化此对象的实例可以存在安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 此对象仅使用受信任的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 对象要转换为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象转换成指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The serialized JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A> method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON-formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例序列化一个类型为其注册的自定义转换器，序列化程序调用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A>方法以获取将转换为 JSON 格式的字符串的名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A> method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> have caused converter recursion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A>方法可能还会引发异常，如果对象图太过复杂，或如果注册的实例<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>导致转换器递归。

trans-unit.source: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的 JSON 格式字符串超出了 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> contains a circular reference.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 包含循环引用。

trans-unit.source: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.
trans-unit.target: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

trans-unit.source: The recursion limit defined by <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> was exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 超出了由 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> 定义的递归限制。

trans-unit.source: The type to which <c>obj</c> will be converted.
trans-unit.target: 为类型<c>obj</c>将被转换。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定对象转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The object that has been converted to the target type.
trans-unit.target: 已转换成目标类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A> method tries to convert the object instance that is represented by `obj` to an instance of type `T`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A>方法尝试将转换由表示的对象实例`obj`到类型的实例`T`。

trans-unit.source: During this conversion there is no guarantee that object reference equality is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 在此转换过程中没有能保证保留对象引用相等性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot assume that `obj` and `T` refer to the same object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不能假定`obj`和`T`引用同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A> is intended to be used if you implement a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A> 如果你实现派生自的类使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>。

trans-unit.source: Converter code must be able to take a value that is in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value to an instance of type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 转换器代码必须能够获取一个值，在序列化程序将传递给它，字典，然后将该值转换为类型的实例`T`。

trans-unit.source: Instead of re-implementing the custom conversion code to perform this task, you can call the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A> method from the converter code.
trans-unit.target: 而不是重新实现自定义转换代码以执行此任务，你可以调用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A>转换器代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object from a value in the dictionary that is passed to the converter.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.ConvertToType%2A>方法来获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>从传递给转换器的字典中值的对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> (or a nested member of <paramref name="obj" />) contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the type resolver that is associated with the serializer cannot find a corresponding managed type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />（或 <paramref name="obj" /> 的嵌套成员）包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是与序列化程序关联的类型解析程序找不到相应的托管类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> (or a nested member of <paramref name="obj" />) contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the result of deserializing the corresponding JSON string cannot be assigned to the expected target type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />（或 <paramref name="obj" /> 的嵌套成员）包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是反序列化相应 JSON 字符串的结果无法分配给所需的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> (or a nested member of <paramref name="obj" />) contains a "__type" property that indicates either <see cref="T:System.Object" /> or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />（或 <paramref name="obj" /> 的嵌套成员）包含指示 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 或不可实例化的类型（例如，抽象类型或接口）的“__type”属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to convert <paramref name="obj" /> to an array-like managed type, which is not supported for use as a deserialization target.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <paramref name="obj" /> 转换为类似数组的托管类型，该类型不可用作反序列化目标。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to convert <paramref name="obj" /> to <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 不能将 <paramref name="obj" /> 转换为 <paramref name="T" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> is a dictionary type and a non-string key value was encountered.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 是字典类型但遇到一个非字符串键值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> includes member definitions that are not available on type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 包括不可用于 <paramref name="T" /> 类型的成员定义。

trans-unit.source: The JSON string to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 要反序列化的 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The type of the resulting object.
trans-unit.target: 所生成对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts a JSON-formatted string to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将 JSON 格式字符串转换为指定类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: This deserialization method does not try to cast the root of the object graph to a specific type, the way that the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method does.
trans-unit.target: 此反序列化方法不会尝试强制转换为特定类型，方法的对象关系图的根，<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法执行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="input" /> exceeds the value of <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 的长度超过了 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The recursion limit defined by <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> was exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 超出了由 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> 定义的递归限制。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains an unexpected character sequence.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含意外的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is a dictionary type and a non-string key value was encountered.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 是字典类型但遇到一个非字符串键值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> includes member definitions that are not available on the target type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包括不可用于目标类型的成员定义。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the type resolver that is currently associated with the serializer cannot find a corresponding managed type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是当前与序列化程序关联的类型解析程序找不到相应的托管类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the result of deserializing the corresponding JSON string cannot be assigned to the expected target type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是反序列化相应 JSON 字符串的结果无法分配给所需的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains a "__type" property that indicates either <see cref="T:System.Object" /> or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含指示 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 或不可实例化的类型（例如，抽象类型或接口）的“__type”属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 JSON 数组转换为类似数组的托管类型，该类型不可用作 JSON 反序列化目标。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to convert <paramref name="input" /> to the target type.
trans-unit.target: 不能将 <paramref name="input" /> 转换为目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the resulting object.
trans-unit.target: 所生成对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The JSON string to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 要进行反序列化的 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified JSON string to an object of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 JSON 字符串转换为 <paramref name="T" /> 类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method is equivalent to first using the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A> method to obtain an object graph and then trying to cast the result to type `T`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法相当于第一个使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.DeserializeObject%2A>方法来获取对象图，然后再尝试强制转换为类型的结果`T`。

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the serializer’s current type resolver is referenced, which determines the managed type to use when converting elements that are nested inside arrays and dictionary types.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间序列化程序的当前类型解析程序引用时，它确定要使用转换嵌套数组和字典类型的元素时的托管的类型。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the deserialization process iterates through all nested elements of `input`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，反序列化过程循环访问的所有嵌套元素`input`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type resolvers, see the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关类型解析程序的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供了进行序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。

trans-unit.source: It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 它需要一个名为类`Person`，下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 JSON 数组转换为类似数组的托管类型，该类型不可用作 JSON 反序列化目标。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to convert <paramref name="input" /> to the target type.
trans-unit.target: 不能将 <paramref name="input" /> 转换为目标类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 类接受的 JSON 字符串的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of JSON strings.
trans-unit.target: JSON 字符串的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 2097152 characters, which is equivalent to 4 MB of Unicode string data.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 2097152 个字符，这等同于 4 MB 的 Unicode 字符串数据。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength%2A> property applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength%2A>属性适用仅当显式创建的实例时才<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the maximum length for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer.
trans-unit.target: 使用`jsonSerialization`元素的配置文件设置的异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).
trans-unit.target: 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置 Microsoft Ajax 中的 ASP.NET 服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于约束要处理的对象级别的数量的限制。

trans-unit.source: The number of object levels.
trans-unit.target: 对象级别的数量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 100。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit%2A> property refers to the number of levels in the object hierarchy that <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> will process in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit%2A>属性引用的对象层次结构中的级别数，<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>将处理在以下情况：

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class is deserializing a JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类反序列化的 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class is walking an object graph during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类在序列化过程中遍历对象图。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit%2A> applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit%2A>适用仅当显式创建的实例时才<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the number of object levels to process for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer.
trans-unit.target: 使用`jsonSerialization`的配置文件设置的对象级别，要处理的异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例的数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).
trans-unit.target: 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置 Microsoft Ajax 中的 ASP.NET 服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 包含要注册的自定义转换器的数组。

trans-unit.source: Registers a custom converter with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer" /> 实例注册自定义转换器。

trans-unit.source: You can register one or more custom converters with a <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance by using the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以注册一个或多个自定义转换器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例使用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RegisterConverters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When custom converters are registered, <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> uses the converters both to serialize managed types and to deserialize JSON strings to managed types.
trans-unit.target: 当注册自定义转换器时，<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>使用托管的类型序列化和反序列化 JSON 字符串转换为托管类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: Multiple converters can be registered with the same <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance, and these converters can indicate support for the same type.
trans-unit.target: 有多个转换器可以注册具有相同<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例，并且这些转换器可以指示为同一类型的支持。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the last converter that is registered for a specific type is the one that will be used by <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> to serialize the type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为特定类型注册的最后一个转换器是将使用的一个<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>以序列化的类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom converters, see the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to register a custom converter with a <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何注册使用的自定义转换器<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="converters" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="converters" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to a JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to a JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The serialized JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A> method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例序列化一个类型为其注册的自定义转换器，序列化程序调用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A>方法以获取将转换为 JSON 字符串的名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A> method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> have caused converter recursion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A>方法可能还会引发异常，如果对象图太过复杂，或如果注册的实例<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>导致转换器递归。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供了进行序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。

trans-unit.source: It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 它需要一个名为类`Person`，下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The resulting JSON string exceeds the value of <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的 JSON 字符串超出了 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> contains a circular reference.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 包含循环引用。

trans-unit.source: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.
trans-unit.target: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

trans-unit.source: The recursion limit defined by <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> was exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 超出了由 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> 定义的递归限制。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> object that is used to write the JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入 JSON 字符串的 <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object and writes the resulting JSON string to the specified <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化对象并将生成的 JSON 字符串写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A> method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>实例序列化一个类型为其注册的自定义转换器，序列化程序调用<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter.Serialize%2A>方法以获取将转换为 JSON 字符串的名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A> method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> have caused converter recursion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.Serialize%2A>方法可能还会引发异常，如果对象图太过复杂，或如果注册的实例<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter>导致转换器递归。

trans-unit.source: The resulting JSON string exceeds the value of <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的 JSON 字符串超出了 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> contains a circular reference.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 包含循环引用。

trans-unit.source: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.
trans-unit.target: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

trans-unit.source: The recursion limit defined by <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> was exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 超出了由 <see cref="P:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit" /> 定义的递归限制。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="output" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="output" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
